Override.entitydescription.heatpads: An easy to store patch used for heating up cold tissue.
Override.entitydescription.alteplase: A thrombolytic agent used to break down blood clots formed in the body. Aids with pulmonary embolism.
Override.entitydescription.furosemide: Used to treat pulmonary edema and lower blood pressure.
Override.entitydescription.aafn: A highly experimental nanite based solution to thaw blood vessels. Highly explosive when paired with alcohol.
Override.entitydescription.towel: A towel used to wipe a patient dry.
Override.entitydescription.warm_rag: A damp warm rag, can be used to heat up cold tissue. Must be stored in a heating container.
Override.entitydescription.warm_iv_bag: A heatable bag of I.V fluids, perfect for raising the core temperature of a patient. Must be stored in a heating container.
Override.entitydescription.heatcontainer: A heating container used to keep items nice and warm.
Override.entitydescription.heatcrate: A heating crate used to keep items nice and warm.
Override.entitydescription.esh: An external heater for diving suits, used when an internal option isn't avaliable. Made with a repurposed tool belt from a poor mechanic, requires a battery.
Override.afflictiondescription.frostnip: The skin is slightly red and cold.
Override.afflictiondescription.d1_frostbite: The skin is a white and waxy numbness.
Override.afflictiondescription.d2_frostbite: The skin is a white and waxy numbness. Painful blisters emerge from the skin.
Override.afflictiondescription.d3_frostbite: The skin has become a putrid purple, amputation is needed to salvage what is left.
Override.afflictiondescription.chilblains: Blisters have formed from the extreme cold, susceptible to infection. Bandage and keep out of water.
Override.afflictiondescription.hypothermia: The body is way too cold.
Override.afflictiondescription.hyperthermia: The body is way too hot.
Override.afflictiondescription.aafn_overdose: The body is rapidly decomposing from excess nanites.
Override.afflictiondescription.reperfusion_injury: The tissue has been damaged from being heat up too quickly.
Override.afflictiondescription.cell_death: The cells have died from being un-thawed.
Override.afflictiondescription.pulmonary_edema: Fluid is caught in the lungs making it difficult to breath.
Override.afflictiondescription.pulmonary_embolism: Blood clots from the limbs have stopped blood flow to the lungs.
Override.afflictiondescription.frozen_vessels: The vessels have crystalized, a fatal condition if not dealt with properly.
Override.afflictiondescription.elevated_core_temp: The body's temperature has been increased.
Override.afflictiondescription.thrombolytics: Thrombolytics have been inserted, helps to treat blood clots.
Override.afflictiondescription.diuretics: Diuretics have been inserted. Helps to treat Pulmonary Edema.
Override.afflictiondescription.heated_diving_suit: The suit has been heated, the freezing temperature is neglible.
Override.afflictiondescription.heat_cramp: The heat is causing the muscles to cramp up.
Override.afflictiondescription.thermal_shock: The sudden temperature change has caused the patient to enter thermal shock.
Override.afflictiondescription.heat_stroke: The patient has passed out due to the heat.
Override.afflictiondescription.sym_cold: The patients skin is cold to the touch.
Override.afflictiondescription.sym_shivers: The patients body trembles to generate heat.
Override.afflictiondescription.sym_numb: The patient is numb to sensations.
Override.afflictiondescription.sym_pins_needles: The patient is experiencing pins and needles.
Override.afflictiondescription.sym_hot: The patient's skin is hot to the touch.
Override.afflictiondescription.aafn: Nanites that specalize in removing ice crystals have been inserted.
